scripts.terrafile-clean: npm run clean-project && npm run clean-env && npm run clean-ou && npm run clean-snapshots && npm run clean-terraform && npm run zip-clean
scripts.terrafile-build: npm run build-project && npm run build-env && npm run build-ou && npm run build-snapshots && npm run build-terraform
scripts.terrafile: npm run terrafile-clean && npm run terrafile-build
scripts.zip: rm -f terraform/snapshots.zip && git archive --format=zip -o terraform/snapshots.zip HEAD:terraform/src/
